text: Ashutosh Sabharwal is a professor and Ph.D of electrical engineering from Rice University, Houston, TX. He was named Fellow of the Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers (IEEE) in 2014 for contributions to the theory and experimentation of wireless systems and networks. == References == Category:Fellow Members of the IEEE Category:Living people Category:Year of birth missing (living people)
title: Ashutosh Sabharwal
